tool_description:
Healthgraphic is a health content search and discovery API that allows developers to retrieve data about diseases, symptoms, medications and much more. The API allows developers to explore a medical knowledge graph that contains millions of facts about health. 

Using the Healthgraphic API, developers can easily integrate high quality health content into their products and engage users.
name: Healthgraphic
title: Healthgraphic

api_list.name: Conditions
api_list.description: Retrieve details about a disease or condition
